title: Working together
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Parent participation
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/School management and organisation
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community and school
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social interaction
description: Outlines ways in which parents can become actively involved in the running of their local school. Shows how at various schools throughout the state parents are helping with children's reading, writing, mathematics, typing, school displays and review of school policy.
